entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #58302
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38229 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #58297
  • Allow running two IServer implementations side by side #58288

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]After configuring the policy key for .NET 9 and set it to nextSession then sign out of the machine and sign back, the net9RC1 Hosting Bundle cannot be removed. #58291
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #58259
  • Perf regression: caching #58254
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #58286
  • Asset fingerprinting does not work for `_content` and `_framework` files #58187
  • Add the ability to load a component using a File path. #58188

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate scopes in OpenApiDocumentProvider tests and fix scope #58307
    area-mvc
  • Use new Dictionary AlternateLookup to avoid allocation in DictionaryJumpTable #58305
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable code analysis and address initial set of issues. #58304
    area-networking
  • Fix #57232 potential CancellationTokenSource leak in HubConnection #58303
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2024-10-08 #58301
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Apply CORS also to .mjs files #58287
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58277
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Remove ProviderKey from Hosting Bundle #58293
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.0
  • Merge RC2 changes into 9.0 #58296
    area-networking, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #58300
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #58299
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58279
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58280
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 9.0.0
  • Remove ProviderKey from Hosting Bundle #58292
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Remove ProviderKey from Hosting Bundle #58294
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.11
  • Fix Http3 Pipe complete #58298
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0953a17` to `6dae7eb` #58184
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58183
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Fix handling for ambient route parameters #58246
    area-mvc, feature-openapi
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal
  • fix: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing RedirectHandler HasBody doesn't work with PATCH #58269
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-mvc-testing
